This is RCS by google, if you deactivate it you will see your spam reducing
https://messages.google.com/disable-chat

That will involve them going through your texts without your knowledge. Privacy laws prohibit it. Even if they block it then there is a chance a legit SMS being blocked leading to them being held liable.

Would be nice but if you just block and report them a few times on your phone, they will also get automatically flagged in the future. Works very reliable for me (Android).
